title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.25 - Urination and Defecation in Parks
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.25 - Urination and Defecation in Parks

State Regulations

No person shall urinate or defecate in any park, or in or
upon any park building, monument or structure, except in a facility which is
specifically designed for such purpose. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
9003.25

Adopted

New

York State Register July 8, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 27, eff. 7/8/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
